```{r}
library(tidyr)

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(stringr)
library(ggplot2)
library(forecast)
library(tseries)
```



```{r}
micro<-read_csv('./data/micro_em.csv')

micro<-micro%>%
  mutate(Week = week(date)) %>% 
  group_by(sample_site, Week) %>%
  summarise(tot_ids = n()) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  arrange((Week))

sample_date <-micro %>% 
  group_by( date) %>% 
  summarise(tot_ids = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  arrange((date))
```

```{r}
 micro %>%
        filter(str_detect(
          sample_site, '304-2'
        )) %>% select(tot_ids) %>% ts()  %>% forecast() %>% plot()
```
```{r}
 micro %>%
        filter(str_detect(
          sample_site, '304-2'
        )) %>% select(tot_ids) %>% ts(frequency = 52) %>% autoplot()
```

```{r}
rate<-micro %>%
        filter(str_detect(
          sample_site, '305-1'
        )) %>% select(tot_ids) %>% ts()
fit_ARIMA <-auto.arima(rate, seasonal = TRUE, lambda = 'auto')
print(summary(fit_ARIMA))
checkresiduals(fit_ARIMA)

fcast<-forecast(fit_ARIMA)
autoplot
plot(fcast)
print(summary(fcast))
```
